LanguageData.ARA_Bodystocking_White.label: Jumpsuit in white silk
LanguageData.ARA_Bodystocking_White.description: The decorative fabrics of the Arachne swarm should be of little use to the swarm.
LanguageData.ARA_Bodystocking_Black.label: One-piece black stockings
LanguageData.ARA_Bodystocking_Black.description: The decorative fabrics of the Arachne swarm should be of little use to the swarm.
LanguageData.ARA_Latex_Catsuit.label: tights
LanguageData.ARA_Latex_Catsuit.description: The decorative fabrics of the Arachne swarm should be of little use to the swarm.
LanguageData.ARA_Pantyhose_Black.label: black stockings
LanguageData.ARA_Pantyhose_Black.description: The decorative fabrics of the Arachne swarm should be of little use to the swarm.
LanguageData.ARA_Pantyhose_White.label: white stockings
LanguageData.ARA_Pantyhose_White.description: The decorative fabrics of the Arachne swarm should be of little use to the swarm.
LanguageData.ARA_Maid_Uniform.label: Arachne maid outfit
LanguageData.ARA_Maid_Uniform.description: One of the fabrics worn by the Arachnids, it is designed to be slim and lightweight, allowing them to gain extra working speed on the Arachne Creep. It is the perfect embodiment of their image of always serving the insect hive.
LanguageData.ARA_Maid_Dress.label: Arachne armed maid outfit
LanguageData.ARA_Maid_Dress.description: It is one of the fabrics worn by the Arachneid bugs. It has an elegant and simple design that allows them to stabilize their body shape on the Arachne germ carpet to achieve shooting accuracy. It is the perfect embodiment of their image of always serving the insect nest.
LanguageData.ARA_Daily_Wear.label: Arachne regular service
LanguageData.ARA_Daily_Wear.description: One of the fabrics worn by the Arachnidok, which allows them to gain caravan movement speed on the Arachne creep, which slowly decays after leaving the creep. This cute uniform can work with the psychic distortion effect of the insect swarm on humans, making them say "so cute".
LanguageData.ARA_Bunny_Girl_Uniform.label: Arachne bunny outfit
LanguageData.ARA_Bunny_Girl_Uniform.description: One of the fabrics worn by the Arachnids, which closely fits the body curves of the Arachnids, allowing them to gain extra movement speed on the Arachne carpet.
LanguageData.ARA_Nurse_Uniform.label: Arachne nurse outfit
LanguageData.ARA_Nurse_Uniform.description: One of the fabrics worn by the Arachnedo worms seems to have obtained the design concept of the red cross element from human society - but the worms themselves do not know why they use this symbol. The fabric contains multiple healing conduits that allow the Arachne to extract nutrients from the creep to heal other individuals.
LanguageData.ARA_Nightdress.label: Arachne nightgown
LanguageData.ARA_Nightdress.description: One of the fabrics worn by the Arachnedo worms, which allows them to gain extra resting efficiency speed on the Arachneid fungus carpet. Sleep is a need that a few insect nests need to maintain frequently, so the value of this set of fabrics is self-evident.
LanguageData.ARA_Eveningdress.label: Arachne evening dress
LanguageData.ARA_Eveningdress.description: One of the fabrics worn by Arachnedo, it is noble and charming, and contains powerful psychic power. This fabric can increase the wearer's psychic power.
LanguageData.ARA_Wedding_Dress.label: Arachne wedding dress
LanguageData.ARA_Wedding_Dress.description: One of the fabrics worn by Arachnedo has breathtaking power. It can extract the power of the creep to launch the ability to steal the mind, allowing the enemy to turn their guns and attack their own people.
LanguageData.ARA_Dragoon_Uniform.label: Arachne guard uniform
LanguageData.ARA_Dragoon_Uniform.description: The high-ranking warriors of the Arachne swarm are clothed in fabrics that let out deafening roars and look surprisingly majesticâ€”but all good illusions will come to naught when they tear your companions apart with their clicking claws.
LanguageData.ARA_Shield.label: Shield and symbiotic muscles
